LanguageData.GDI_PowerConduit.label: gdi power conduit
LanguageData.GDI_PowerConduit.description: A set of electrical cables for moving power around. Can be placed under walls and other buildings. GDI's ion control makes it very durable.
LanguageData.GDI_PowerConduit_Blueprint.label: gdi power conduit (blueprint)
LanguageData.GDI_PowerConduit_Frame.label: gdi power conduit (building)
LanguageData.Light_GDI.label: Ion Lamp
LanguageData.Light_GDI.description: GDI uses the ionizing feature of Tiberium to power this lamp.
LanguageData.Light_GDI_Blueprint.label: Ion Lamp (blueprint)
LanguageData.Light_GDI_Blueprint_Install.label: Ion Lamp (blueprint)
LanguageData.Light_GDI_Frame.label: Ion Lamp (building)
LanguageData.GDI_Grave.label: Honorable Grave
LanguageData.GDI_Grave.description: This honorable grave is for those who fought in the most stressful situations. Our soldiers shall not be forgotten!
LanguageData.GDI_Grave_Blueprint.label: Honorable Grave (blueprint)
LanguageData.GDI_Grave_Frame.label: Honorable Grave (building)
